1176:8: kintveṣāmeva yā tathatā sā tathāgata ityarthaḥ |
1176:12: tatra tu parṣanmaṇḍale bahavo bhinnamatayaḥ sanniṣaṇā iti |
1176:15: mī dṛṣṭāntā na samuccayenetyevaṃ sarvatrādhikavacane parihāraṃ varṇayanti |
1176:16: tathā dṛṣṭāntasyaiva kathanātpratītyasamutpannatvādiko hetuḥ prājñairabhyūhanānnokta iti |
1176:29: na hi tathāgato rūpakāyato draṣṭavya iti kalpitasyaikāntaśūnyatvānna rūpaskandhātmakastathāgataḥ |
1176:36: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ supta ityādi |
1176:39: janmanyanyatra tasmin vā tadā kālāntare'pi vā ||
1176:40: taddeśo'nyadeśo vā svapnajñānasya gocaro na bhavatyanyākārajñānasyānyālambane'
1176:52: śīlādapi varaṃ bhraṃśo na tu dṛṣṭeḥ kadācana |
1176:53: śīlena gamyate svargo dṛṣṭyā yāti paraṃ padam ||
1176:54: iti nyāyena ta eva māyopamadharmatādhimuktā bhagavataḥ śiṣyāḥ |
1176:55: kalpitādipadārthatrayatattvarūpaniṣedhe sati nāstyeva tathāgata iti mandadhījanāśaṅkāmapākurvan pratītyasamutpannastathāgato'stītyāha |
1176:59: ti vacanāt sādhāraṇaṃ sattvānāṃ śubhaṃ karma pratītya saṃvṛtyā kuśalamūlahetukatvānna ca tānyahetukāni,
1176:61: na cāhetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāya iti buddhavineyānāmeva sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlavaśena niṣpattigamanānnāhetukaḥ kāyaḥ |
1176:75: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścaratītyādinā |
1176:77: sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyata ityanenāpi prājñaptikaśabdanirdeśena sāmagyāstāttvikaṃ janakasvabhāvaṃ nirasyati |
1176:79: anekaṃ kāraṇamekaṃ kāryaṃ karotyanekaṃ vā tathaikamapi kāraṇamanekamekaṃ vā kāryaṃ kuryāditi catvāro vikalpāḥ |
1176:81: pi kāryasya bhedābhāvānna kāraṇabhedo bhedakaḥ kāryasya syāt |
1176:85: evañca sati bhedābhedāvyatirekādviśvasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syādahetoranyānapekṣaṇāt |
1176:86: nanu sāmagrī janayitrī kāryasya tasyāśca bhedābhedānuvidhānacaturāvimāvanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā kāryasya bhedābhedāvataḥ kathaṃ tāvahetukau bhaviṣyata iti cet |
1176:88: tathā hi na sāmagrī nāmānyā kācana samagrebhyaḥ kintarhi samagrā eva bhāvāḥ sāmagrīśabdavācyāḥ te ca parasparavyāvṛttasvabhāvāścakṣurādayo bhinnāḥ santo yadyekamevābhinnaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāryamupajanayituṃ śaktāstadā sāmagryantarāntaḥpātino'
1176:89: pi bhāvāḥ samagrāḥ kimiti cakṣurvijñānasyopajananaṃ na kuryuḥ |
1176:92: pi parasparaṃ bhinnasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ janayantīti vaktavyam |
1176:100: kintu yadekasya tajjanakaṃ rūpaṃ tadanyasya nāstyanyo'
1176:102: ataḥ svarūpājjanakādvyāvṛttyasiddheryathāsvaṃ bhinnāśca janakāśca svabhāveneti ko'
1176:104: tathā hyekasmājjanakādvyāvartamānastadrūpo na syānna tvatatkāryastenaiva ca tatkāryaṃ kartavyaṃ nānyeneti ko'
1176:105: tra nyāya iti yadyevamekenaiva tatkāryaṃ kṛtamiti kimapareṣāṃ tatkāryakaraṇe prayojanam |
1176:107: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yato'
1176:111: evaṃ tarhyekena hetunā yaḥ kāryasya svabhāvo janyate sa evāpareṇeti prāptam |
1176:113: kāraṇabhedo visadṛśasyābhinnasa kāryasyotpādakatvena bhedako na syāt |
1176:115: pi cakṣurādaya eva kenacitsvabhāvātiśayena cakṣurvijñānajanane niyatā nāpare kṣityādayaḥ |
1176:116: tathā hi teṣāmeva cakṣurādīnāṃ sa svabhāvātiśayo nāpareṣām |
1176:123: evaṃ vilakṣaṇakāraṇakalāpādvilakṣaṇamavilakṣaṇāccāvilakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ jāyata ityetāvataivāṃśena hetubhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedāvuktāviti |
1176:125: yasmādya evobhayaniścitavācī hetuḥ sa eva sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇañceti nyāyādabhedāviśeṣe'
1176:126: pi hetudharmasāmarthyādyathā na sarvaṃ sarvasādhakaṃ tadvadbhedāviśeṣe'
1176:127: pi na sarvaṃ sarvasādhakamityevasabhyupagatahetuphalasambandhaṃ sāṃkhyādikaṃ pratyucyamānaṃ śobhāmādhatte |
1176:128: vastutattvato hetuphalabhāvāpavādī mādhyamikastaṃ pratisvabhāvātiśayasteṣāṃ svahetoriti hetudharmasāmarthyalakṣaṇo heturasiddhaḥ svapakṣasiddhaye siddhavat kathamupādīyate |
1176:133: ayathādarśanaṃ tarhi niṣedha iti vyaktamidaṃ kūrmaromotpāṭanam |
1176:135: na tattvataḥ pramāṇasahāyatvenāpramāṇasahāyasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyābhyu pagamātkathaṃ nāyathādarśanamabhyupagamaḥ |
1176:139: yastu pramāṇopapannasvarūpaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo varṇyate sa pratyakṣasamādhigamyo na bhavati nirvikalpakatvena pratyakṣasya pramāṇopapannasvarūpāvadhāraṇāsāmarthyavaikalyāt |
1176:140: na ca vastupratibhāsanādeva tadavyatiriktatathāvidhasvarūpasya pratibhāsanamiti yuktaṃ vaktumatathāvidhasvarūpasyāpi keśoṇḍūkādeḥ pratibhāsanāt |
1176:148: yāvatā vicāravimardāsahiṣṇutvenāvicāraikaramyaṃ pūrvapūrvasvakāraṇaṃ samāśrityottarottaramīdṛśaṃ pratiniyata deśakālādisatkāryaṃ pravartate |
1176:149: ata eva ca saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇa vaikalyācchaśaviṣāṇādīnāmanutpattiḥ |
1176:155: yathā ca bādhā yathādarśanaṃ tathā nyāyābhāvāt |
1176:156: atha matamanekameva kāraṇamanekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣo'
1176:158: kāraṇasvabhāvaviśeṣasya kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣe vyāpriyamāṇatvena kārye kāraṇavyāpāraviracitānāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣāṇāmasaṃkīrṇatvāt |
1176:162: pi vastutaḥ kāryasya nirvibhaktarūpasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavantīti na kāraṇabhede'
1176:168: athā bhedastebhyo na siddhastathā ca nānekatvaṃ vijñānasya bhaviṣyatīti cet |
1176:170: bhyupagamyamāne tadvijñānaṃ nirhetukameva syātkāraṇavyāpārasya vijñānādanyatropalambhātmatādiṣūpayogādevaṃ ca nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā bhavediti doṣaḥ |
1176:172: tathā ca satyupalambhātmatādīnāṃ parasparato bhedo na syādekavijñānasvarūpatvādvijñānasvātmavat |
1176:179: yadyevaṃ te viśeṣāḥ kalpanoparacitatvena vyomotpalādaya iva na hetuvyāpāramapekṣanta iti kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavantīti na yuktamabhidhātum |
1176:180: athāpekṣanta iti nirbandhastathā sati kalpanāśilpighaṭiteṣṭhevopalambhātmatādiṣu kāraṇavyāpāro vyavasthāpyamānaḥ kālpanika eva bhūtārtho na syādevañca kāryamahetukaṃ kāraṇavyāpārasya kalpitasvabhāveṣūpayogāt |
1176:181: athoktadoṣabhayādabhinnamekaṃ kāryaṃ viśeṣāśca bhinnā na ca kāryātmavyatiriktā iti matiḥ |
1176:182: evantarhi bhinnābhinnasvabhāvādhyāsitatvāddharmadharmiṇorvastutaḥ candratārakādivadbhedānna kevalaṃ vyatiriktameva sāmānyaṃ balādāpatati,
1176:187: pi tasya sambhavo viṣayākārasvātmavadityeka eva kārye sambhavāsambhavau kāraṇe caikatra janakājanakau yugapattattvato virudhyate |
1176:191: nahi sarvaṃ darśanaṃ bādhyamānamapi pramāṇena pramāṇaṃ,
1176:193: athaikameva kāraṇamanekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi tṛtīyaḥ pakṣo'
1176:196: ekasmādanekakāryotpattau na kāraṇābhedaḥ kāryasyābhedaka iti bhedo'
1176:197: pi bhedasya na heturiti bhedābhedau viśvasyāhetukau syātām |
1176:203: athānyenaivaṃ tarhi kāraṇābhedo na yuktimān na hyātmātiśayādanyo bhāvaḥ |
1176:211: cakṣuryena svabhāvena cakṣuḥkṣaṇaṃ janayati kintenaiva cakṣurvijñānamapi |
1176:213: evaṃ yena vā svabhāvena cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayati tenaiva cakṣurapi |
1176:220: yadi vyatiriktau tadā tāvevārthakriyālakṣaṇatvādvastuno janakau vastunī syātāṃ cakṣustvavastu syādakiñcitkaratvāt |
1176:227: atha mataṃ svahetorekajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ kāraṇaṃ yathā kāryamekaṃ janayati tathā svahetorevotpannamanekaṃ janayatīti |
1176:229: tathā hi yathaikasyānekajanakatvaṃ nirācikīrṣitaṃ tathaikajanakatvamapīti kiṃ mādhyamikaṃ pratyevamucyate |
1176:231: syādetat,yadi bhedajanananiyatasvabhāvādabhedotpattiḥ na tarhi kāraṇasvabhāvānuvidhāyi kāryaṃ syādityahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ yāvatā cakṣuṣaḥ sakāśādbhedajanananiyatasvabhāvāccakṣuṣo vijñānasya vā cakṣuḥsvabhāvasyodayātkathaṃ na bhedotpatiḥ |
1176:232: tathāhi na kāraṇaṃ prati kāryaṃ parasparavilakṣaṇābhiḥ śaktibhiranugatamiti bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ karotītyapitu svabhāvāditi |
1176:234: yaṃ svabhāvo nāma viśvarūpo yena prāguktānekaprakāravirodhe'
1176:240: pratibhāsamānasya śāstrādyāśrayeṇa parikalpitarūpasya tattvotpattyādyākārasya niṣedhādyayā buddhyā tattvaṃ sandhriyate,
1176:241: yasyāṃ vā buddhau sā tādṛśī lokapratītiḥ saṃvṛtiriṣṭā tayā sarvamidaṃ pratīyamānasvarūpaṃ viśvaṃ satyaṃ,
1176:243: ato yathādarśanaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo durnivārastathā ca sati yat kaiścidevaṃ dūṣaṇamucyate'
1176:244: bhāvaḥ saṃvṛtirutpādo bhāva iti yugapadarthakriyāyāṃ yogyamayogyaṃ vastvabhyupagatam |
1176:245: athotpādaḥ saṃvṛtistadā saṃvṛtyotpāda ityasya vākyasyotpattyotpāda ityabhyupagamānna kiñcidniṣṭamāpatitam |
1176:246: tathānutpādaḥ paramārtha ityevaṃ paramārthena notpāda ityasyānutpādena notpāda ityarthaḥ |
1176:249: athaikameva kāraṇa mekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi caturthaḥ pakṣo'
1176:255: bhyupagamyamāne cakṣurādijātyucchedenaikasmājjñānakṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ na cakṣurādayo nāpi jñānamiti tadevāndhatvādikamanāyāsena jagataḥ prāptam |
1176:258: tathā cāmī sarve rūpādayo bhāvā iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
1176:259: yathādarśanaṃ pratītyotpādadarśanānnāsiddho hetuḥ sapakṣe bhāvānna viruddhaḥ pūrvaprabandhena vipakṣe bādhakapramāṇopadarśanādanaikāntikaśca na bhavatītyamunā nyāyena pratyayādhīnavṛttitvādyathāśabdaḥ prājñaptikastathā bhagavatāṃ kāyo vyavasthāpita iti |
1176:264: tasmādbhāvādyabhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsaṃ tadvirodhinaiḥsvābhāvyajñānātprahāya tanmūlaṃ sakalaṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ krameṇāpākurvāṇaḥ prathamādibhūmau niyato bhaviṣyasyanuttarabodhāvityartha |
1176:267: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartata iti |
1176:274: na kṛpā mandatedānīṃ na ca me dharmamatsaraḥ |
1176:276: na ca me niṣṭhitaṃ śāstraṃ tarkayāmi na cāntikāt |
1176:277: ājñātuṃ na ca me śaktāḥ vineyā na ca sādarāḥ ||
1176:280: iti nyāyādāryasadāpraruditasya pariśuddhāśayatājijñāsārthaṃ saptavarṣāṇi samāpanna eva sthita ityeke |
1176:291: yadyapi sarva eva sarvadharmasamatādayo deśanāprakārā dharmanairātmyadyotakatvena tulyāstathāpi pauruṣeyatvādvakturabhiprāyaṃ kāryatayā sūtrayeyuramī śabdāḥ,
1176:299: tadanantaraṃ ca sambhārāṣṭādhimuktibodhisattvatathāgatabhūmiṣu dharmakāyasya yathābhavyaṃ vineyajanapratiṣṭhāpanakarmaparidīpanārthaṃ sarvadharmānupalabdhitayetyādi padacatuṣṭayaṃ veditavyamityayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ |
1176:304: yasmin samādhau vyavasthitaḥ sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratipadyate sa sarvadharmasamatā nāmaḥ samādhirevaṃ sarvadharmaviviktaśca nāma samādhirityādi vācyam |
1176:306: tathā hi prathamena kalpāsaṃkhyeyena sambhārabhūmimārabhya yāvatprathamā bhūmirniṣpadyate dvitīyena tu vimalābhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bhūmiḥ,
1176:307: tṛtīyena punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyenācalābhūmimārabhya yāvadbuddhabhūmirityevaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbuddhatvamadhigamyata iti yathārutameva sūtraṃ virudhyate |
1176:308: trikasāmānyāt tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairityuktaṃ na punaḥ paramārthata ityevaṃ neyārthasūtravyākhyāne nitarāmeva virodhaḥ |
1176:311: tadanu pramuditābhūmimupādāya yāvaddharmameghāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratyekaṃ tribhistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbodhisattvo niṣpādya samantaprabhāṃ buddhabhūmimāsādayatītyevaṃ trayastriṃśatā kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbuddhatvaṃ prāpyata ityācāryavasubandhupādāḥ |
1176:314: atra samādhyabhinirhāropāyā eva samādhimukhāni na tu samādhayaḥ "
